description: Due to some is_vpn logic in network create, the vpn image fails to get the proper kernel and ramdisk from the image.  This was not the original purpose of the is_vpn check in compute/api.py
title: vpn image fails to pick up kernel and ramdisk

comments.content: Due to some is_vpn logic in network create, the vpn image fails to get the proper kernel and ramdisk from the image.  This was not the original purpose of the is_vpn check in compute/api.py
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
